name: Innovation Choice Group
tag_list: biotechnology, ecommerce, research-consulting, bioinformatics, crowd-sourcing, qa-portal, life-sciences
overview:
Innovation Choice Group is bringing to market a professional online network that finds rapid solutions to the urgent questions of biotechnology researchers, scientists, students and others central to the life sciences by providing a collection of trusted experts who can assist with their questions.

ICG, for short, is aiming to bridge the gap between individuals seeking expertise in a medical/scientific/research inquiry and the available resources to answer such inquiries. Currently, those fields mainly use a “scientific journal-only” approach to solve issues and Innovation Choice Group believes that this method is not the best way to go about this process. Data can be outdated, difficult to access, unavailable for free or not exactly relevant to the question at hand. Instead, ICG will allow users to access the portal in order to directly interact with experts who can provide approaches and/or a detailed explanation of how to tackle your question.

In esence, we seek to change the way people do medical/scientific research; paper-based approaches will not end any time soon, but with ICG’s portal, scientists all over the world can access an “expert crowd-sourced community” which dynamically adapts to the user’s needs and facilitates innovation in the most efficient fashion. And unlike our competitors, we actually verify/vet registered users who want to bid answers to the scientific questions. In this way, complete transparency is assured and scientists will be more eager to participate in our portal.
